about_the_game:
Kinny and the Lost Starlight is a roguelike deck-building game inspired by tic-tac-toe, where your goal is to light up the cosmos by calling stars to the board and defeating your enemies.

Story

A witch's journey to bring back the light for her little friend in a cosmos where light faded

Dana, an underachiever at the Space Witch School, has been sent to a remote planet with her low grade. Her job is to take care of light-feeding creatures called "Kinny". At first, Dana resents the Kinnies, but as she spends time with them, she grows closer to them.

But one day, the cosmos was plunged into darkness, and the light-feeding Kinnies began to suffer. Dana embarks on a journey to restore the light to save her beloved Kinnies.

How will this journey end? Why is the cosmos covered in darkness? Will the Kinnies ever be happy again?

Gameplay


Three types of cards are used to battle on a 3*3 board.
  • Starcall Cards: Call a star to a set location. When a star fills a line on the board, you earn Star Power.
  • Movement Cards: Move to a set location. Be sure to plan your moves well.
  • Attack Cards: Reduce the enemy's armour. When an enemy's armour reaches 0, you spend your Star Power to damage their health.
Be careful, if the enemy fills a line of the board with darkness, Dana will be damaged!
Utilise three types of cards and defeat your enemies and light up the cosmos!

name: Kinny and the Lost Starlight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphic card w/ DX 10 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
